title: Gold Steadies as Investors Shift Focus to Rate Policy Next Year
description: Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond a near-certain reduction in US interest rates for guidance on monetary policy next year.
content: Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond a near-certain reduction in US interest rates for guidance on monetary policy next year.
